titleInfo.title: A New Wave of Climate Insurgents Defines Itself as Law-Enforcers

mods.abstract: The author characterizes the upcoming 2016 "Breakfree" protests as part of a “climate insurgency”, which is seen “not only as a moral but as a legal right and duty, necessary to protect the Constitution and the public trust for ourselves and our posterity”. Brecher catalogues other U.S. examples, including the court challenges led by Our Children’s Trust.
